snippet: The backup singers who are the focus of “20 Feet From Stardom” have been taking the stage wherever they can to help win over Academy voters. Recent stops include the Rose Bowl and a bar in Times Square, where Glenn Close and Steve Buscemi sang...
abstract: The backup singers who are the focus of “20 Feet From Stardom” have been taking the stage wherever they can to help win over Academy voters. Recent stops include the Rose Bowl and a bar in Times Square, where Glenn Close and Steve Buscemi sang with them.

headline.main: Trying to Sing Their Way to the Oscars
